Dame Angela Brigid Lansbury DBE (16 Ọktoba 1925 - 11 Ọktọba 2022) bụ onye Irish-British na onye na-eme ihe nkiri na onye ọbụ abụ America bụ onye rụrụ ọrụ dị iche iche na fim, ogbo, na telivishọn
Ọrụ ya ruru afọ iri asatọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ya na United States, ọrụ ya nwetara nnukwu nlebara anya mba ụwa
N'oge ọnwụ ya, ọ bụ otu n'ime kpakpando ikpeazụ dị ndụ site na Golden Age nke Hollywood sinima
Ọ nwetara ọtụtụ nkwanye ugwu, gụnyere Tony Awards isii (gụnyere onyinye nrite oge ndụ), onyinye ọla edo isii, onyinye Laurence Olivier na Academy Honorary Award
A họpụtara ya maka onyinye agụmakwụkwọ atọ, iri na asatọ Primetime Emmy Awards, na onyinye Grammy
N'afọ 2014, Queen Elizabeth II họpụtara Lansbury Dame Commander nke Order nke Alaeze Ukwu Britain.
